column4: I've been using the official gnome3 PPA, suddenly today ubuntu kept telling me I had to do a system upgrade, and it took down all those packages with no replacements, what gives?
anyone else using gnome3 ppa ran into this?
you are already using gnome3 and you don't need a gnome3 ppa if what you want is install gnome-shell
it says it's already installed, but nothing on boot right now. it just has the ubuntu splash with the row of dots
